backend/main.mo: Defines Motoko actor types and comparison utilities for events, competitions, payments, and results, including sorting helpers and data models for the platform.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records describing implemented admin-query wiring and admin error-state improvements with associated files and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in routing, UI, admin pages, solve flow, and profile logic.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables for light/dark modes and applying global base styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/public/env.json: Provides environment variable containing backend canister ID.
frontend/public/razorpay.config.json: Stores Razorpay payment configuration including key, currency, and theme settings.
frontend/REGRESSION_SMOKE_TEST_CHECKLIST: Manual regression checklist covering authentication, competitions, payment flow, solve flow, timers, and refresh recovery scenarios.
frontend/src/api/errors.ts: Maps various backend error messages to user-friendly strings.
frontend/src/api/queryKeys.ts: Defines stable React Query keys and key generators for API caching.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures React Query, theme provider, and full TanStack Router route tree for public and admin pages.
frontend/src/components/admin/Competitio: UI component for selecting and editing competition fee modes and syncing changes upward.
Protects admin pages by checking authentication and admin status, showing loaders or errors as needed.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity auth and clearing cached queries on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that blocks access until the user is authenticated, showing a login prompt otherwise.
frontend/src/components/competition/Comp: Card UI for a competition showing name, dates, status, and event info with navigation.
Main layout with header, navigation, auth controls, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/leaderboard/Lead: Renders a leaderboard table showing ranks, competitor names, Ao5, and solve times, with navigation to user profiles.
frontend/src/components/profile/Payments: Displays a user's payment history with sorting, loading states, and detailed payment cards.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileM: Shows a dropdown menu for authenticated users with profile info and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Provides a dialog for creating a user profile by collecting email and display name and submitting them.
frontend/src/components/solve/Inspection: Implements a 15‑second inspection countdown with scramble visibility toggling and start/skip controls.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveCompl: Displays a completion screen after all solves with navigation options and video evidence submission instructions.
frontend/src/components/solve/SolveTimer: Interactive solve timer component that starts, updates, and stops a millisecond timer, notifying parent callbacks on start and completion.
frontend/src/components/system/ActorInit: Displays a detailed connection error message with troubleshooting steps and a retry button.
frontend/src/components/system/AdminQuer: Shows a compact admin data‑loading error panel with the error message and a retry action.
frontend/src/config/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay config from a JSON file with caching and falls back to default values on failure.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBeforeUnloadWarnin: Adds a before‑unload browser prompt when enabled to warn users about unsaved progress.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Fetches the current caller’s user profile once an actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useGoLiveAttempt.ts: Manages multi‑step go‑live deployment simulation, tracking step status, diagnostics, and errors.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context, handling login, stored identity loading, and state tracking.
Blocks browser back navigation with a confirmation prompt when enabled.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains query and mutation helpers for backend interactions including users, competitions, payments, and results.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styling.
frontend/src/lib/ao5.ts: Provides Ao5 calculation logic handling DNFs and defines leaderboard entry types.
frontend/src/lib/competitionPricing.ts: Utility functions to detect paid competitions and format or extract pricing information.
frontend/src/lib/csv.ts: Generates and downloads CSV files for competition results with escaping utilities.
frontend/src/lib/dateUtils.ts: Formats bigint timestamps into readable date and date-time strings.
frontend/src/lib/goLiveDiagnostics.ts: Simulates deployment steps with callbacks, random failures, and error normalization.
frontend/src/lib/goLivePreflight.ts: Runs preflight checks for environment, payment config, network, and build artifacts.
frontend/src/lib/razorpay.ts: Loads Razorpay checkout script and opens payment checkout using configured options.
frontend/src/lib/solveSession.ts: Stores, retrieves, and clears solve-session data in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/lib/timeUtils.ts: Formats millisecond times into readable seconds or DNF.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCompetitio: Displays and manages all competitions with actions for creating, deleting, locking, and activating using admin queries.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCreateComp: Form page for creating a new competition, handling event selection, scramble input, fee configuration, and validation before submission.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminEditCompet: Loads an existing competition for editing, populates fields, validates scrambles, and submits updates via admin API.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminGoLivePage: Runs deployment preflight checks and shows step-by-step go-live progress with diagnostics and failure handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminLandingPag: Provides the admin dashboard landing page with navigation to user, competition, and results management sections.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminResultsPag: Admin UI for selecting competitions/events, viewing results, toggling visibility, and exporting filtered results to CSV.
Admin interface to list users and perform block, unblock, and delete actions with loading/error handling.
frontend/src/pages/CompetitionDetailPage: Displays competition details, handles event selection, payment flow, and starting or resuming a competition session.
Fetches and lists competitions grouped by status with cards for running, upcoming, and completed events.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardPage.tsx: Shows a competition leaderboard with event selection and handles loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LeaderboardsHubPage.t: Lists all competitions with status badges and links to their leaderboards, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Displays and edits the authenticated user's profile and includes a payments history section.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfilePage.tsx: Shows a public competitor profile with basic stats and event-based results grouping.
frontend/src/pages/SolveFlowPage.tsx: Manages the solve flow with inspection, solve timing, session sync, and recovery handling using backend queries and local session storage.
frontend/src/types/admin.ts: Local admin-side type definitions for result inputs, profiles, and user summaries.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Extended type definitions mirroring backend Motoko models including competitions, results, leaderboards, and session state.
frontend/src/types/domain.ts: Defines event labels, the event list, and a default event constant.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session storage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, architecture, issues, and features for the speedcubing platform.
